name: Grotto (Bannock)
description:
Grotto - Made for KrassJam 11 with theme "An Action Game where you kill to survive in an apocalyptic world."

Santa in an apocalyptic world where he has to kill waves of mutant elves. Didn't manage to get all features complete (Rudolph's bombing spree). 

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Aim - Mouse

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Reload
